typography.headingStyle: Bold sans-serif, large size (48px+), dark navy color (#001A4D)
typography.bodyStyle: Regular sans-serif, medium gray (#666666), generous line height for readability

components.description: Muun logo with navigation links (Contact, Blog, Twitter, GitHub)
components.notable: Minimal, clean header with social/external links

components.description: Multi-paragraph privacy policy content
components.notable: Dense legal text with consistent formatting

design.visualHierarchy: Large bold heading draws focus, then guides eye down through paragraphs sequentially

flow.userIntent: Read and understand Muun's privacy practices and data handling policies
flow.informationArchitecture: Sequential legal document structure: intro statement → purpose → data usage policy → terms reference
frictionPoints: Dense paragraphs may be difficult to scan quickly
No visual breaks or section anchors for navigation
Legal jargon could be challenging for non-technical users

copy.headline: Privacy Policy

microcopy.text: Muun Wallet Inc. built the Muun app as a Free app
microcopy.purpose: Establish company identity and service offering

microcopy.text: We will not use or share your information with anyone except as described in this Privacy Policy

trustSignals: Free and open service model stated upfront
References to Terms and Conditions for legal framework

copy.headline: Terms of Use

microcopy.text: Muun Wallet Inc., a company incorporated in the Cayman Islands

Multiple contact paths organized by use case rather than single email

flow.userIntent: Find the right contact method for their specific need (support, sales, general inquiry, security)
exitPoints: Click email link to open mail client
Navigate to other pages via header links

interactiveElements.action: Opens email client for support or bug reports
Opens email client for general inquiries

flow.informationArchitecture: Segmented by use case (Support, Contact, Responsible Disclosure) with clear purpose statements and actionable email addresses
frictionPoints: Email links require user's mail client to be configured
No form-based alternative for users without email configured

copy.headline: Contact us
copy.subheadline: Send us an email and get in touch with our team. We usually respond within a few hours.

microcopy.text: Send us an email and get help or report bugs.
microcopy.purpose: Clarifies what support email is for

microcopy.text: You can encrypt your email message using our public PGP key.
microcopy.purpose: Offers security option for sensitive communications

microcopy.text: Send us an email if you have a question or want to chat.
Send us an email to report any security related bugs or vulnerabilities.

dataFormatting: PGP fingerprint: 1299 28C1 E79F E011 6DA4 C80F 8DB7 FD0F 61E6 ED76
trustSignals: Multiple dedicated contact channels show accessibility
Response time guarantee ('usually respond within a few hours')
PGP key availability demonstrates security commitment
Specific responsible disclosure path shows security maturity
